name: DUKE ENERGY
sampleDescriptions: Counsel and advocacy related to tax reform; HR 1, An Act to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.
Energy and Environmental issues affecting electric suppliers- Generally;
Assist on corporate tax matters including clarifications with respect to the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017.
